description: Styles for the Navbar component of the simple todo application, including layout, colors, and responsive design.

classes.name: navbar
classes.description: Main styling for the navigation bar, including dimensions and background.

classes.name: sticky
classes.description: Styling for the navbar to make it sticky at the top of the viewport.

classes.name: inner
classes.description: Container styles for inner content of the navbar, including flex properties.

classes.name: brand
classes.description: Styling for the brand or logo part of the navbar.

classes.name: placeholder
classes.description: Styling for placeholder text within input elements.

classes.name: right
classes.description: Styling for right-aligned items within the navbar, such as buttons or links.
